Text: Why is each songs file so large?

@Slimz

Cause it's a Vinyl rip yo!

Top Quality Recording. PS: Listen to FLAC 24/96 quality with the correct app to know how great a recording this really is. If you use winamp or iTunes, you might as well just rip from the cd and listen to mp3@128 quality. 

But, with the correct app and sound card (must be 24bit sound card), FLAC 24/96 will sound so much better than the actual CD in a CD player. Thanks npto :)

http://www.foobar2000.org/
